Hey everyone, as recommended by <@!301186049323958275> I would like to purpose to add/replace the method name for arbitrary signing on the Ethereum JSON-RPC API

TLDR' eth_sign and personal_sign have had its history and I think we have the opportunity of converging into a single method by simplifying changing its method name and defining its standard behavior to return prefixed signatures
